nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Check if contract is paused
@return bool True if the contract is paused, false otherwise.
nodes.name: paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by a admin to pause, triggers stopped state.
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by a admin to unpause, returns to normal state.
nodes.name: unpause

acceptOwnership().details: New owner pending to accept ownership executes this function to confirm his ownership.

pause().details: Called by a admin to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().return: bool True if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

params._newOwner: New owner address acquiring ownership of contract

unpause().details: Called by a admin to unpause, returns to normal state.
